constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 8 (Wednesday, January 12, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SAN NICOLAS:
H.R. 6388.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 1 provides Congress with the
power to ``impose taxes and spend the money collected to pay
debts and provide for the ``common defence'' and ``general
welfare.''
[Page H78]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

sponsors.fullName: Del. San Nicolas, Michael F. Q. [D-GU-At Large]

title: Combating Terrorist and Other Illicit Financing Act
